body_html: @martinwicke , do we have any plans for package distribution through other than pip means. I know ubuntu/Debian was a non-starter for various reasons. We certainly would be happy to accept contributions by the community in this area as package maintainers.
body_text: @martinwicke , do we have any plans for package distribution through other than pip means. I know ubuntu/Debian was a non-starter for various reasons. We certainly would be happy to accept contributions by the community in this area as package maintainers.
body: @martinwicke , do we have any plans for package distribution through other than pip means. I know ubuntu/Debian was a non-starter for various reasons. We certainly would be happy to accept contributions by the community in this area as package maintainers.
